verses.text: \w If|strong="H3884"\w* \add it had not been\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* who was on our side, now may \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*;
\w If|strong="H3884"\w* \add it had not been\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* who was on our side, when \w men|strong="H0120"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against us:
\w Then|strong="H0233"\w* they had swallowed us \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w quick|strong="H2416"\w*, when their \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against us:
\w Then|strong="H0233"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* had \w overwhelmed|strong="H7857"\w* us, the \w stream|strong="H5158"\w* had gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*:
\w Then|strong="H0233"\w* the \w proud|strong="H2121"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* had gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who hath not \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us \add as\add* a \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* to their \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.

Our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* as a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* out of the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* of the \w fowlers|strong="H3369"\w*: the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* is \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, and we are \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*.

Our \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \add is\add* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
